name: Tappy plane (MN games official)
description:
Tappy plane is a simple game in which you move with a plane in different environments, You should avoid colliding with obstacles on your journey.

Controls:
  • Click / Space  (Windows).
  • Tap  (Android).
Team:
  • Programmer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Designer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Graphics: Kenney.nl.
  • Music & SfXs: Kenney.nl.
